fa9e2fda-0694-41b0-afc8-5e091dee2e27.name: Aged Care Quality Standard 1: Consumer Dignity and Choice

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete Aged Care Quality Standard 1: Consumer Dignity and Choice.

1e4246d6-7b09-4e6e-ba7e-b1769f9f5d76.description: The online learning is applicable to learners in residential aged care services, home services and flexible care services. This course is suitable for new and experienced carers. Standard 2: Ongoing Assessment and Planning with Consumers builds on the foundations of Standard 1. It requires that organisations work together with consumers to assess their needs and plan their care to meet consumer’s needs, goals and preferences.
1e4246d6-7b09-4e6e-ba7e-b1769f9f5d76.name: Aged Care Quality Standard 2: Ongoing assessment and planning with consumers

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete Aged Care Quality Standard 2: Ongoing assessment and planning with consumers.

edb79940-81de-4474-80ea-c330b1c3fb1f.description: Standard 3: Personal Care and Clinical Care focusses on the expectations that the community and consumers have regarding the safe, effective and quality delivery of personal and clinical care and is aimed at leaders, managers and other staff members responsible for the delivery of care and services to consumers receiving residential aged care and home care services.
edb79940-81de-4474-80ea-c330b1c3fb1f.name: Aged Care Quality Standard 3: Personal care and clinical care

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete Aged Care Quality Standard 3: Personal care and clinical care.

50506cc8-229d-4a21-a6d7-7e33717d630c.description: Standard 4: Services and Supports for Daily Living focusses on how providing services and supports for daily living improves the lives of consumers living in residential services and is aimed at leaders, managers and other staff members responsible for the delivery of care and services to consumers receiving residential aged care and home care services.
50506cc8-229d-4a21-a6d7-7e33717d630c.name: Aged Care Quality Standard 4: Services and supports for daily living

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete Aged Care Quality Standard 4: Services and supports for daily living.

9a64773d-5ea0-467e-b24c-039245a4b874.description: Standard 5: Organisation’s Service Environment focusses on the physical environment that organisations provide their consumers. Environments must be clean, comfortable, safe and well-maintained. It must support the consumer’s quality of life, as well as their independence. These expectations do not apply to organisations that provide care in the consumer’s home or facilities they may visit.
9a64773d-5ea0-467e-b24c-039245a4b874.name: Aged Care Quality Standard 5: Organisation’s service environment

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete Aged Care Quality Standard 5: Organisation’s service environment.

8273267b-7c03-4548-aadb-fb1701a312f5.description: Aged Care Quality Standard 6: Feedback and complaints focusses on the need for an organisation to have a complaints resolutions system in place that is confidential, accessible, fair and timely for all consumers. The resolution process should lead to outcomes that benefit the consumer and improve the relationship between the consumer and the organisation. Consumers should be encouraged to provide both positive and negative feedback and be responded to in formal and informal means.
8273267b-7c03-4548-aadb-fb1701a312f5.name: Aged Care Quality Standard 6: Feedback and complaints

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete Aged Care Quality Standard 6: Feedback and complaints.

f737da32-21f7-4349-8ab4-8c0ca4619aab.description: Aged Care Quality Standard 7: Human Resources course focusses on the responsibility that the organisation has to provide enough skilled, qualified staff to provide the highest level of care and services to consumers. Organisations must also support workers by providing the equipment they need to provide care to consumers, as well as giving them the appropriate amount of time to complete their work.
f737da32-21f7-4349-8ab4-8c0ca4619aab.name: Aged Care Quality Standard 7: Human resources

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete Aged Care Quality Standard 7: Human resources.

a5714c65-1564-4884-a506-a06af1c25830.description: Aged Care Quality Standard 8: Organisational Governance course focusses on the organisation being responsible for setting strategic priorities and the delivery of quality care and services.
